metadata.synopsis: British Dr. Hare (Michael Craig) falls for a colleague (Virginia Maskell), while large surgeon Sir Lancelot (James Robertson Justice) winds up in a strip joint.

reviews: This British farce has received some harsh notices in the United Kingdom but I found it a reasonably diverting item.

There are two main sorts of British film joke at the moment: the Carry on series... and the Doctor series, a rather more sophisticated effort. I prefer Carrying on; at least they make you yelp occasionally.
